data.prayer: Jesus, help the local leaders in Tuyên Quang, Vietnam not be proud but humble, and willing to wash the feet of all they serve.
data.verse: “You call me ‘Teacher’ and ‘Lord,’ and rightly so, for that is what I am. Now that I, your Lord and Teacher, have washed your feet, you also should wash one another’s feet. I have set you an example that you should do as I have done for you.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Tuyên Quang, Vietnam
data.section_summary: What needs would people have here?

data.prayer: Spirit, help the disciples in the state of Tuyên Quang to find a person of peace today, like the Philippian jailer, who heard and was immediately baptized with his whole family.
data.verse: And they spoke the word of the Lord to him and to all who were in his house. And he took them the same hour of the night and washed their wounds; and he was baptized at once, he and all his family.

data.section_summary: On average, 52 people will die without Jesus in the next 100 hours in Tuyên Quang, Vietnam.
data.prayer: Lord, send your gospel to these.
Lord, please give the 16,155 believers in the state of Tuyên Quang the Spirit of wisdom and revelation, so that they might know you better.
data.verse: I keep asking that the God of our Lord Jesus Christ, the glorious Father, may give you the Spirit of wisdom and revelation, so that you may know him better.

data.prayer: Spirit, teach the 16,155 believers that their old life is dead and their new life is hid with Christ.
data.verse: For you died, and your life is hidden with Christ in God.

data.prayer: Lord, please remember the Tay Tac people. you said you wanted worshippers of every tongue and tribe and nation, yet we know of no worshippers among them.
Spirit, help the church in the state of Tuyên Quang do things that will multiply their numbers, not just add to them.
data.verse: But thanks be to God, who always leads us triumphantly as captives in Christ and through us spreads everywhere the fragrance of the knowledge of Him.

data.prayer: Father, be a refuge and strength for the hurting in Tuyên Quang, Vietnam today.
data.verse: God is our refuge and strength, an ever-present help in trouble.

data.section_summary:
the state of Tuyên Quang, Vietnam has a population of 746,900.

We estimate Tuyên Quang has 16,155 people who might know Jesus, 59,911 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 670,835 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 46 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Father, you desire the people in the state of Tuyên Quang who are far from you to hear about you.
data.verse: "Those who were not told about him will see, and those who have not heard will understand."
